body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting our customer service. My name is Gary Mitchell and I'm here to assist you. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hello Gary, my name is Michelle Taylor.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Michelle. Can I have your email address for verification purposes, please?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you. And could you also provide me with your phone number, but please spell out the digits for security reasons?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, it's five six two - eight seven nine - four three two one.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great, thank you for that information, Michelle. Is there anything specific you need help with today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Not really, I was just inquiring about your pricing for a future reservation.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I understand, Michelle. Thank you for reaching out. If you have any more questions in the future, feel free to contact us again. Have a wonderful day!
